MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53, LL54 and LL55 postcode areas of Caernarfon, affecting a large number of properties in a widespread area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment on the overhead line network and trees on the line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:54PM on 23rd February 2021.
